verses.name: 1 Kings 6:27
verses.text: And he set the cherubims within the inner house: and they stretched forth the wings of the cherubims, so that the wing of the one touched the one wall, and the wing of the other cherub touched the other wall; and their wings touched one another in the midst of the house.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:28
verses.text: And he overlaid the cherubims with gold.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:29
verses.text: And he carved all the walls of the house round about with carved figures of cherubims and palm trees and open flowers, within and without.

verses.name: 1 Kings 6:30
verses.text: And the floor of the house he overlaid with gold, within and without.
